data.message: Phase 1A fixes based on code review feedback: Fixed: 1) Enhanced embedding_queue health check to report failed_count and oldest_pending_age_mins (warns if >30 mins or any failed), 2) Changed delete_artifact to BLOCK on backup failure instead of just warning, 3) Verified real end-to-end test: store_fact creates .pending file with correct content, health check reports incremented queue depth. All files contain real implementations (embeddings.py: 170 lines, embedding_worker.py: 270 lines, ranking_config.py: 321 lines).
data.task: Phase 1A fixes based on code review feedback
data.outcome: Fixed: 1) Enhanced embedding_queue health check to report failed_count and oldest_pending_age_mins (warns if >30 mins or any failed), 2) Changed delete_artifact to BLOCK on backup failure instead of just warning, 3) Verified real end-to-end test: store_fact creates .pending file with correct content, health check reports incremented queue depth. All files contain real implementations (embeddings.py: 170 lines, embedding_worker.py: 270 lines, ranking_config.py: 321 lines).
